segments.text: Hello sir , how can I help you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I need this prescription please .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Let ’ s see . Okay , so 50 mg of Prozac , would you prefer this in capsule or tablet ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Okay , you should take 1 capsule 3 times a day.Be sure not to take it on an empty stomach , and also , don ’ t ever mix it with alcohol !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I know . It ’ s not the first time I ’ m taking this ! Don ’ t worry , I won ’ t overdose !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Okay , anything else I can get you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , yes , I almost forgot ! Can I also get some eye drops and um , some condoms ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sure . Darn condoms aren ’ t registered in our system .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , well that ’ s okay , I ’ ll get some later , thanks ... Really it ’ s no problem .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Just hang on there a sec . Can I get a price check on Fun Times Ribbed Condoms please !
segments.speaker: S1
